function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate evaluation of drugs for COVID-19 therapy","Impact":"Ineffective treatment for COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Conducting adequate studies with realistic eligibility criteria and patient stratification","Technologies":"Medical research and clinical trial technology","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Medical research institutions, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Spread of SARS-CoV-2 in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure and infection","Mitigation":"Implementing strict prevention and protection organizational measures","Technologies":"Access control systems, surveillance technology","People":"Employees, visitors, travelers","Owner":"Companies, competent health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and surveillance measures","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 within and across regions","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict quarantine and surveillance measures for individuals with potential exposure","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, travel monitoring systems","People":"Traveling staff, individuals with potential exposure","Owner":"Companies, competent health authorities"}]}
